nodes.text: Kenneth C. Flint is an author. He has contributed two short stories to the Star Wars universe; Doctor Death: The Tale of Dr. Evazan and Ponda Baba for Tales from the Mos Eisley Cantina and Old Friends: Ephant Mon's Tale for Tales from Jabba's Palace.

According to Kevin J. Anderson's introduction in the second edition Dark Empire trade paperback, published in 1995, Flint was writing a novel in which Luke Skywalker returned to Tatooine in search of an artifact belonging to Obi-Wan Kenobi. This book, which was tentatively titled The Heart of the Jedi, was eventually canceled.
